Summary: please charge me for the second shipment
text:
I have tried to find a way to let amazon know that the first package arrived and the second one too and I wish to pay for both orders. Initially the first package was routed to the wrong apartment number but then it was delivered correctly to the address...after I wrote about it not coming amazon sent another one and I was not charged. The second one arrived and I want to pay for it

THIS IS THE WORLD'S GREATEST HONEY.....I LOVE IT AND BOUGHT IT FOR MY SISTER. IT HELPS DIGESTION...AND IS SOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO GOOD
